snippet: Ray Allen told the Miami Heat on Friday night that he intended to accept their contract offer and leave Boston after five seasons.
abstract: Ray Allen tells the Miami Heat that he intendeds to accept their contract offer and leave the Boston Celtics after five seasons, even though it will mean a pay cut.
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen told the Miami Heat on Friday night that he intended to accept their contract offer and leave Boston after five seasons.
